name: Istituto Poligrafico e Zecca dello Stato - CNAC
goal:
The main goals of the Italian CNAC activity are :

- Technical analysis on suspect euro coins
- Technical analysis on unfit coins
- On the spot checks at the operational institutions of cash handlers
- Official test on CPMs for the inclusion in the Public List of CPMs
- Training to law enforcement and cash handlers
euInitiatives: Italian Authority  with regards to the technical trainings on counterfeit euro coins under the EU programme PERICLES.
